name: Palm View Guest House & Conference Center

reviews.title: look elsewhere
reviews.text: This place was nasty and the staff was rude. The only thing nice about this B & B was the pool. It was far from everything, and the walk was ridiculous to the strip, or the main area where tourists go. Spend a few more dollars, and look elsewhere for a nicer room!

I stayed at this hotel which was booked by the 'bride and groom to be' for one week in February. The guest house is 10mins away from Montego Bay airport and 30 walk away from the main Montego Bay strip.
reviews.title: Nice Guest House in need of updating

likes.liked: — The size of the rooms - nice and biig

reviews.text: The hotel is in need of updating, but it is well kept and the room are very clean and tidy. We stayed in the 3 bedroom guest house opposite the pool.
reviews.title: maybe
Secret paradise
reviews.text: Bedrooms were clean and tidy and bigger than the average hotel room size. Bathroom had a shower (shower was luke warm in during the late evenings) but in general it was OK. Towels provided could have been a lot better and the ones we were give were very tatty.

reviews.title: Quiet and Relaxing
reviews.text: Satellite TV in the main sitting area and the kitchen had a gas cooker and large fridge freezer. Cutlery and crockery were a little scares and the kitchen was in need of refurbishment.

reviews.title: I Would Not Send My Worst Enemy
reviews.text: Only 1 microwave on site, so if you have a 'little one' be sure to ask for it.
